name: Classic Black Hoodie
description: Heavyweight premium cotton hoodie with a brushed interior for maximum comfort. A staple for any minimalist wardrobe.

name: Structured Overcoat
description: Tailored wool-blend overcoat featuring clean lines and a modern silhouette. Perfect for layering over formal or casual attire.

name: Urban Cargo Trousers
description: Technical trousers with multiple utility pockets and an adjustable hem. Engineered for the modern city explorer.

name: Minimalist White Tee
description: Ultra-soft Pima cotton t-shirt with a refined fit. Designed to maintain its shape and softness wash after wash.

name: Silk Slip Dress
description: Elegant silk slip dress with delicate straps and a fluid drape. A versatile piece that transitions from day to night effortlessly.

name: Linen Blend Blazer
description: Relaxed-fit blazer in a premium linen blend. Combines structured tailoring with a breathable, summery feel.

name: High-Waist Wide Leg Pants
description: Sophisticated high-waist trousers with a dramatic wide-leg silhouette. Crafted from a structured wool-crepe fabric.

name: Cashmere Turtleneck
description: Luxurious 100% cashmere turtleneck sweater. Exceptionally soft, warm, and designed for a timeless appeal.

name: Heritage Gold Watch
description: Classic timepiece with a brushed gold case and a genuine leather strap. A perfect blend of heritage and modern design.

name: Technical Backpack
description: Water-resistant commuter backpack with a dedicated laptop sleeve and multiple organizational compartments.

name: Premium Leather Belt
description: Handcrafted full-grain leather belt with a minimalist brushed steel buckle. An essential finishing touch.

name: Architectural Sunglasses
description: Bold square-frame sunglasses crafted from premium acetate. Features polarized lenses with 100% UV protection.

name: Stealth Running Sneakers
description: High-performance sneakers with a breathable mesh upper and responsive cushioning. Designed for both speed and style.

name: Leather Chelsea Boots
description: Timeless Chelsea boots handcrafted from premium calfskin leather. Features elasticated side gussets and a durable sole.

name: Minimalist White Sneakers
description: Clean, uncomplicated sneakers made from soft nappa leather. A versatile staple that defines the modern minimalist aesthetic.

name: Suede Loafers
description: Premium suede loafers with a comfortable cushioned footbed. Perfect for adding a touch of sophistication to any casual look.

name: Denim Trucker Jacket
description: Vintage-inspired denim jacket with a modern tailored fit. Features custom hardware and heavy-duty stitching.

name: Oversized Knit Sweater
description: Chunky oversized sweater in a soft wool-blend. Designed for a cozy, relaxed silhouette without sacrificing style.

name: Noir Core Beanie
description: Soft-touch ribbed beanie crafted from organic cotton. A warm and breathable essential for cooler conditions.

name: Monochrome Wool Scarf
description: Generously sized wool scarf with a subtle weave texture. Designed to provide exceptional warmth and an elegant drape.

name: Tailored Column Skirt
description: Sleek column skirt with a structured finish and a subtle back slit. A masterclass in minimalist evening wear.

name: Urban Stealth Boots
description: Technical field boots with a reinforced toe and weather-resistant leather. Built for any terrain, designed for the city.

name: Minimalist Card Holder
description: Ultra-slim card holder crafted from smooth Italian leather. Features four slots and a central pocket for essentials.

name: Structured Canvas Tote
description: Heavyweight canvas tote with reinforced leather handles. A perfect combination of durability and minimalist design.
